ldatools
  • Reference
  • News

ldatools A set of utility functions for life-time data analysis (LDA)

Installation

Install from GitHub via

devtools::install_github("adibender/ldatools")

Acknowledgments

The geom_stepribbon function was copied almost without change from the RcmdrPlugin.KMggplot2 package (https://github.com/cran/RcmdrPlugin.KMggplot2).

A very useful function but loading the plug-in always starts Rcmdr and resizing caused errors.
